author: djrtwo
content:
There is someone impersonating me on Discord. I will never ask anyone for money. Please report and block them
This has ramped up in general. Stay diligent. If something seems off, it probably is.

author: protolambda
content: And warning: the 4 digit code that comes with discord usernames can also be spoofed by bad actors. Never trust anyone, always verify by reaching out on another platform to double check weird personal messages.
